messages.message: That said, if the tables we have aren’t working for us — drop them, redesign, and come up with a 1 time migration (if necessary)

It’s not necessarily that they can’t work, I just feel like it’s much easier to onboard to, iterate, and maintain when we only have to worry about a couple json files instead of a couple json files and several db tables at the same time. I feel like other features like project versioning also become much easier to implement
